detail_desc: Short, V-neck dress in a softly draping viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.

Fitted shirt in washed denim with a turn-down collar, a yoke front and back and pearly press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Classic oversized shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back for added width. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Classic oversized shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back for added width. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in a viscose weave with sturdier trim details. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Long, deep-cut raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs that can be rolled up and fastened with D-rings. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Shirt in a viscose weave with sturdier trim details. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Long, deep-cut raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs that can be rolled up and fastened with D-rings. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.
A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Sleeveless jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with buttons at the top and a seam at the waist with elastication at the back and sewn-on tie belt at the front. Straight, ankle-length legs.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Top in an airy, patterned viscose weave. Round neckline with a contrasting colour trim and small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Flutter sleeves, and a gathered yoke front and back.
Wide blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, V-neck with buttons at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button, narrow buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Wide blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, V-neck with buttons at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button, narrow buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Coat in twill made from a wool blend. High collar with concealed press-studs, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, front pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Dungarees in stretch denim made from a cotton blend with front and back pockets and adjustable straps with metal fasteners.
Dungarees in stretch denim made from a cotton blend with front and back pockets and adjustable straps with metal fasteners.
Jacket in washed, stretch cotton denim with sparkly-stone appliqués on the back. Collar, buttons down the front, fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Metal earrings with an asymmetric disc at the top and an arch with asymmetric pendants and plastic beads. Width approx. 4 cm, length approx. 8 cm.
Metal earrings with an asymmetric disc at the top and an arch with asymmetric pendants and plastic beads. Width approx. 4 cm, length approx. 8 cm.
Short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey, one crêped. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a flounce-trimmed yoke.

Playsuit in mesh with sequin-embroidered details. Deep, wrapover V-neck with a scalloped trim at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long trumpet sleeves with scalloped trims, a seam with narrow elastication at the waist, and wide legs. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with embroidery on the front and sleeves. Round neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flare and double flounce at the cuffs. Concealed zip in the side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Dress in a soft, patterned modal and cotton weave with a square neckline, flutter sleeves and buttons down the front. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in lace with a small, pompom trimmed stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves. Seam at the waist with a lace trim, a concealed zip in one side, and raw, scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Playsuit in plumeti chiffon containing glittery threads with a small frilled collar and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a frill trim at the cuffs, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and short legs. Partly lined in jersey.
Fully lined swimsuit with a lightly draped front and gathers in the sides. Integral bra with removable inserts and space for breast prostheses, and an elasticated hem. Adjustable shoulder straps.
Non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups with space for breast prostheses. Adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, gathers in the sides, gentle draping at the front and medium coverage at the back.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidered details. Deep, wrapover V-neck with a scalloped edge, and wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist and a flared, gently bell-shaped skirt. Lined.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidered details. Deep, wrapover V-neck with a scalloped edge, and wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist and a flared, gently bell-shaped skirt. Lined.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Dress in an airy, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a small V-neck opening and buttons at the top. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and gathered seams at the waist and below to create width and a tier in the skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with flounces down the front, a V-neck with ties at the neckline and long sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Dress in airy, slub-weave cotton with a square neckline, small opening with a button at the back and flutter sleeves with embroidered details. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt with a print motif at the hem. Lined.

Set with a dress and matching bolero. Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined. Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top.

Set with a dress and matching bolero. Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined. Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top.

Set with a dress and matching bolero. Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined. Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top.

Straight-cut, knee-length, double-breasted coat in soft, felted fabric with a brushed finish. Wide notch lapels, large, toning buttons, raglan sleeves and side pockets. Lining in quilted satin with a sheen.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Wide skirt in a lightweight, patterned cotton weave with covered elastication at the waist and gathers at the top. Lined in a cotton weave.

EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a square neckline front and back and an opening with a shimmering button at the back of the neck. Flutter sleeves with overlocked edges that continue over the shoulders, and gathered seams with a small frill trim on the skirt. Lined.

EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Crop-legged jumpsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps. Double-layered top with ties at the front and covered elastication at the top of the back. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and wide, straight legs.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Top in a lightweight, patterned cotton and viscose weave with an elasticated neckline, short, wide raglan sleeves and a knot detail at the hem.
Straight-cut jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
V-neck cardigan in a soft, loose, chunky knit with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets.
V-neck cardigan in a soft, loose, chunky knit with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets.
V-neck cardigan in a soft, loose, chunky knit with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend decorated at the top with shimmering plastic beads. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and long sleeves with a frill trim at the cuffs.
V-neck body in ribbed jersey with a wrapover front and ties at one side, long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs and press-studs at the crotch.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, fluffy knit. Deep V-neck, pearly buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, fluffy knit. Deep V-neck, pearly buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, fluffy knit. Deep V-neck, pearly buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Long jumper in a soft, fine knit decorated at the top with plastic beads. Small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit decorated at the front with shimmering plastic beads. Dropped shoulders, long, wide puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long jumper in a soft, chunky knit with a ribbed stand-up collar, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long jumper in a soft, chunky knit with a ribbed stand-up collar, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with a frill at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with a frill at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with a frill at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with a frill at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long, pleated dress in satin with a sheen. Draped, wrapover top section, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, seam under the bust and flared skirt. Lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Empire-line dress in sturdy satin with a layer of tulle on top and a matching hairband. Dress with shimmering buttons at the back, a gathered seam and fabric flower appliqués at the top and a flared skirt. Lined. Hairband in satin with matching fabric flower appliqués on top and elastication at the back.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with a lace-embroidered bodice and glittery skirt. V-neck at the back with a detachable bow, and a flared skirt in two layers of tulle with a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Voluminous skirt in tulle and patterned organza with a glittery elastic waistband. Lining in a cotton weave.

Padded, oversized jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip and long sleeves with narrow ribbed elastication at the cuffs. Lined. The filling is made from recycled polyester.

Padded, oversized jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip and long sleeves with narrow ribbed elastication at the cuffs. Lined. The filling is made from recycled polyester.

Padded, oversized jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip and long sleeves with narrow ribbed elastication at the cuffs. Lined. The filling is made from recycled polyester.
